mapper.select: SELECT ci.inquiry_no as inquiryNo, ci.title, ci.content, ci.reg_date as regDate, ci.status, ci.answer_date as answerDate, u.name AS userName FROM customer_ask ci JOIN users u ON ci.user_id = u.uno WHERE (ci.status = #{status} OR #{status} IS NULL) AND (ci.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR #{keyword} IS NULL) AND ( (ci.reg_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}) OR (#{startDate} IS NULL OR #{endDate} IS NULL) ) ORDER BY ci.inquiry_no DESC LIMIT #{startRowNo}, #{listCnt}
